text:
@morningmika @realDonaldTrump Just the facts - @THEHermanCain did not die of #COVID19

He was a 74-year-old survivor of stage 4 colon cancer and as such, he died of complications due to #COVID19

If an older individual has any kind of underlying medical condition, they will be more at risk.

Facts Do Matter‼️
